name: Гель Nivea Men Комфорт Fresh после бритья 100мл
ingredients: aqua, alcohol denat.(12% об.), glycerin, peg-8, maltodextrin, citrus limon juice, ascorbic acid, distarch phosphate, phenoxyethanol, peg-40 hydrogenated castor oil, acrylates/c10-30 alkyl acrylate crosspolymer, carbomer, sodium hydroxide, menthol, sodium sulfate, citral, limonene, geraniol, hexyl cinnamal, citronellol, linalool, ethyl benzoate, parfum, ci 42090
